Q: How to add system-integration to DBGL?

A: Follow these instructions:
1) On Windows XP: Navigate to folder C:\Documents and Settings\<user-account>\SendTo.
   On Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8 you can type shell:sendto in the location bar of a Windows Explorer window.
2) Right-click, choose New - Shortcut
3) Click Browse, navigate to the DGBL folder and choose 'add.bat'
4) Click Next, and type the name for the shortcut, for example 'DBGL'
5) Click Finish

In order to use, right-click on any game executable, choose Send To - DBGL
